channel.title: CVE Feed for Accusoft -- ImageGear
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Accusoft -- ImageGear

item.title: CVE-2021-21945|2024-08-03T18:30:23.443Z -- accusoft -- imagegear
item.description: Two heap-based buffer overflow vulnerabilities exist in the TIFF parser functionality of Accusoft ImageGear 19.10. A specially-crafted file can lead to a heap buffer overflow. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger these vulnerabilities.This heap-based buffer oveflow takes place trying to copy the second 12 bits from local variable.

item.title: CVE-2021-21938|2024-08-03T18:30:23.489Z -- accusoft -- imagegear
item.description: A heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the Palette box parser functionality of Accusoft ImageGear 19.10. A specially-crafted file can lead to code execution. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2021-21942|2024-08-03T18:30:23.563Z -- accusoft -- imagegear
item.description: An out-of-bounds write vulnerability exists in the TIFF YCbCr image parser functionality of Accusoft ImageGear 19.10. A specially-crafted file can lead to remote code execution. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-32588|2024-08-03T07:46:44.610Z -- accusoft -- imagegear
item.description: An out-of-bounds write vulnerability exists in the PICT parsing pctwread_14841 functionality of Accusoft ImageGear 20.0. A specially-crafted malformed file can lead to memory corruption. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2021-21939|2024-08-03T18:30:23.620Z -- accusoft -- imagegear
item.description: A heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the XWD parser functionality of Accusoft ImageGear 19.10. A specially-crafted file can lead to code execution. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-22137|2024-08-03T03:07:48.284Z -- accusoft -- imagegear
item.description: A memory corruption vulnerability exists in the ioca_mys_rgb_allocate functionality of Accusoft ImageGear 19.10. A specially-crafted malformed file can lead to an arbitrary free. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-23400|2024-08-03T03:43:45.219Z -- accusoft -- imagegear
item.description: A stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the IGXMPXMLParser::parseDelimiter functionality of Accusoft ImageGear 19.10. A specially-crafted PSD file can overflow a stack buffer, which could either lead to denial of service or, depending on the application, to an information leak. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2021-21943|2024-08-03T18:30:23.636Z -- accusoft -- imagegear
item.description: A heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the XWD parser functionality of Accusoft ImageGear 19.10. A specially-crafted file can lead to code execution. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2021-21914|2024-08-03T18:30:23.459Z -- accusoft -- imagegear
item.description: A heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the DecoderStream::Append functionality of Accusoft ImageGear 19.10. A specially-crafted file can lead to code execution. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2021-21946|2024-08-03T18:30:23.521Z -- accusoft -- imagegear
item.description: Two heap-based buffer overflow vulnerabilities exists in the JPEG-JFIF lossless Huffman image parser functionality of Accusoft ImageGear 19.10. A specially-crafted file can lead to a heap buffer overflow. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger these vulnerabilities.This heap-based buffer overflow takes place when the `SOF3` precision is lower than 9.

item.title: CVE-2022-29465|2024-08-03T06:26:05.101Z -- accusoft -- imagegear
item.description: An out-of-bounds write vulnerability exists in the PSD Header processing memory allocation functionality of Accusoft ImageGear 20.0. A specially-crafted malformed file can lead to memory corruption. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2021-21944|2024-08-03T18:30:23.622Z -- accusoft -- imagegear
item.description: Two heap-based buffer overflow vulnerabilities exist in the TIFF parser functionality of Accusoft ImageGear 19.10. A specially-crafted file can lead to a heap buffer overflow. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger these vulnerabilities.This heap-based buffer oveflow takes place trying to copy the first 12 bits from local variable.

item.title: CVE-2021-21947|2024-08-03T18:30:23.524Z -- accusoft -- imagegear
item.description: Two heap-based buffer overflow vulnerabilities exists in the JPEG-JFIF lossless Huffman image parser functionality of Accusoft ImageGear 19.10. A specially-crafted file can lead to a heap buffer overflow. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger these vulnerabilities.This heap-based buffer overflow takes place when the `SOF3` precision is greater or equal than 9.

item.title: CVE-2021-21949|2024-08-03T18:30:23.945Z -- accusoft -- imagegear
item.description: An improper array index validation vulnerability exists in the JPEG-JFIF Scan header parser functionality of Accusoft ImageGear 19.10. A specially-crafted file can lead to an out-of-bounds write and potential code exectuion. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.
